doc.title: Polspoel & Desmet
doc.plot: In this format, Flemish journalists Guy Polspoel (formerly VRT news staff) and Yves Desmet (editor in chief, De Morgen newspaper) receive one or more guests from various walks of life (but mainly Belgian politicians and other media people) in a VTM studio to discuss one or more topics relating to recent news items. Guest get to state their positions and are questioned, as the whole panel discussion is intended to provide background information beyond the current news.
